alt.description: This attribute defines the alternative text describing the image
alt.description_zh: 图像无法显示时的替代文本

:icon.description: the `Icon` type for an icon avatar, see `Icon` Component
:icon.description_zh: 设置头像的图标类型，可设为 Icon 的 `type` 或 VNode

:loadError.description: handler when img load error, return false to prevent default fallback behavior
:loadError.description_zh: 图片加载失败的事件，返回 false 会关闭组件默认的 fallback 行为

src.description: the address of the image for an image avatar
src.description_zh: 图片类头像的资源地址

srcSet.description: a list of sources to use for different screen resolutions
srcSet.description_zh: 设置图片类头像响应式资源地址
